column4: hi all, I setup a share folder between ubuntu 8.04 and my friends Vista pc.  Vista can put items in the share folder, but they show up as locked/read only on Ubuntu.  How can I make it so that ubuntu and edit and do whatever to the files placed in there by Vista???
How can I make it so that ubuntu can read and edit and do whatever to the files placed there by Vista.
BTW, I hate Vista....from the little time spent using it on my friends pc.
